name: ETTV Dark style
description:
A dark style for ETTV 

Non-destructive, keeps the exact same layout
additional_info:
My very first style published, may not be perfect but does the job

Used some code from "Ettv Ice Dark" style for a few things I was not able to sort out

06-Sep-2020: updated due to new ETTV url (https://www.ettvcentral.com/) + forum style
